statements: SELECT * FROM vpn_connection_logs ORDER BY connect_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, ip_address FROM vpn_connection_logs WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT id, username, connect_time, disconnect_time FROM vpn_connection_logs WHERE username LIKE '%smith%';
SELECT * FROM vpn_connection_logs WHERE disconnect_time IS NOT NULL AND status = 'terminated';
SELECT id, ip_address, status FROM vpn_connection_logs ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM vpn_connection_logs WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, username, connect_time FROM vpn_connection_logs WHERE status = 'connected' ORDER BY connect_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vpn_connection_logs WHERE status = 'disconnected';
SELECT * FROM vpn_connection_logs WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT username, MIN(connect_time) AS first_connect_time, MAX(connect_time) AS last_connect_time FROM vpn_connection_logs GROUP BY username;
SELECT * FROM vpn_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, client_ip FROM vpn_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, server_ip, vpn_protocol FROM vpn_logs WHERE server_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type LIKE 'Brute Force%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, investigation_status FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, client_ip FROM vpn_logs WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM vpn_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY client_ip DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_connections FROM vpn_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_connections > 10;
SELECT vpn_logs.log_id, vpn_logs.timestamp, security_incidents.incident_type FROM vpn_logs JOIN security_incidents ON vpn_logs.log_id = security_incidents.log_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(connection_duration) AS total_duration FROM vpn_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections;
SELECT id, user_id, connection_time, vpn_server, connection_status FROM vpn_connections WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_info ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT incident_id, user_id, description, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections WHERE connection_status = 'Active' ORDER BY connection_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections WHERE connection_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections WHERE vpn_server = 'US_Server' AND connection_status = 'active' ORDER BY connection_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, vpn_server, connection_time FROM vpn_connections WHERE connection_status = 'inactive' ORDER BY connection_time ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, v.connection_time, v.vpn_server FROM user_info u JOIN vpn_connections v ON u.user_id = v.user_id WHERE u.role = 'admin';
SELECT s.incident_id, s.description, s.severity, u.username FROM security_incidents s JOIN user_info u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE s.severity = 'high' ORDER BY s.incident_time DESC, u.username;
SELECT * FROM vpn_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM vpn_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT server_name, server_ip FROM vpn_servers WHERE server_ip LIKE '192.168%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_users WHERE user_id = 'f9168c5e-ceb2-4faa-b6bf-329bf39fa1e4';
SELECT last_login, username FROM vpn_users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT server_ip, server_name FROM vpn_servers WHERE server_ip LIKE '192.%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vpn_connections WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_user WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM vpn_user WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT server_name, location FROM vpn_server WHERE server_id = 3;
SELECT server_ip FROM vpn_server WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM vpn_connection_log ORDER BY connection_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_user WHERE username='john_doe' ORDER BY connection_time DESC;
SELECT server_name, location, server_ip FROM vpn_server WHERE location='USA' ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, server_id, connection_start, connection_end FROM vpn_connection_log WHERE connection_start > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT alert_type, alert_description FROM vpn_alerts WHERE alert_type='Security Breach' OR alert_type='Unauthorized Access' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_description FROM vpn_incidents WHERE incident_type='Data Leak' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
